title: Data Privacy
content: We protect your data with end-to-end encryption and never sell it.

title: Community Guidelines
content: Users must respect each other and avoid offensive language.

title: How to accept a gig
content: Click on a gig you're interested in and press 'Accept'.

title: How to set up your profile
content: Click on your avatar and select 'Edit Profile' to add bio, skills, and more.

title: How to invite friends
content: Use your referral link found under the 'Refer & Earn' tab.

title: How to upload a product
content: Go to the 'Products' tab, click 'Add Product', and fill in the details.

title: Terms of Service
content: By using QLIQ, you agree to our usage rules and payment structure.

title: How to top up Qoyns
content: Navigate to Wallet > Top Up and choose a payment method.

title: Content Moderation
content: Content violating our rules will be removed without notice.

title: What are Qoyns?
content: Qoyns are platform credits you can earn or spend on services.

title: Is there a mobile app?
content: Yes, the QLIQ app is available on Android and iOS.

title: How do I reset my password?
content: Go to the login page, click 'Forgot Password', and follow the instructions.

title: How do I delete my account?
content: Visit your account settings and click 'Delete Account'.

content: Yes, you can update your role from your profile settings.
